body.p:
Louisville Ky 13th Feby 1862
His Excellency Gov B Maggoffin
Frankfort
Ky
D Sir
I am Examiner for the County of Jefferson and have present applications at my Office for a Notary Republick. will you be kind enough to appoint me a Notary Republick
Enclosed please find $1.00 to pay for the Commission.

Very Respectfully
Your Obdt Servt
Jno H Talbott
